name: Mountain Adventure
description: A thrilling hike through the mountains, filled with stunning landscapes and challenging terrains.

points_of_interest.title: Summit Top
points_of_interest.description: Reached the summit after a tough climb!!!!

points_of_interest.title: River Crossing
points_of_interest.description: Crossed a fast-flowing river. Took a break after.

points_of_interest.title: Wildlife Sighting
points_of_interest.description: Saw a Kiwi during our trek! A rare sight.

points_of_interest.title: Meal Break
points_of_interest.description: Taking a snack break and enjoying the view.
